name: Shooey!!
description:
Submitted for the Ludum Dare 40 game jam Theme being "The more you wave the worse it is."

The aim is to stand upright while pulling of the sickest tricks. 

The web app is the game that was made during the Ludum Dare Game Jam #40

and the downloadable windows file is a nicer reworking that makes the game actually play able.

Controls-

Designed for use with an Xbox one controller.

keyboard controls. 

left shift/ left cntrl/left alt/ space
